So, as I go through and make sure all the tags and data are perfect, as I am wont to do, I find that the track "In My Mind (w/The Pixies)" from Disc 21 isn't on the releases I know of.  Also, "Life in a Glass House" (track #378) from disc 22 is missing.  If anyone can help me, perhaps find these files, I will seed a perfectly ID3 v 2.4 tagged version.  Otherwise, this is complete and amazing.  Well done.
